mapper.select: select * from employee where emp_num = #{emp_num} and emp_pw = #{emp_pw}
select r.od_num, s.name, i.item_name, r.rc_amount, i.item_price, r.rc_time from receive r join store s on r.num = s.num join item i on r.item_num = i.item_num
mapper.insert: insert into store(num, pw, name, boss, phone, tel, email, address, address_detail, postalcode, note, state) values(#{num}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{boss}, #{phone}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{address}, #{address_detail}, #{postalcode},#{note}, #{state})
insert into item(item_num, item_name, item_type, item_price, item_state, item_note) values(#{item_num},#{item_name},#{item_type},#{item_price},#{item_state},#{item_note})
mapper.select: select a.od_num, a.item_num, a.num, a.od_amount, a.received_not, a.od_note, a.od_time, a.item_num, b.name, c.item_name, c.item_price from `order` a join store b on a.num = b.num join item c on a.item_num = c.item_num where od_num = #{od_num}

select a.od_num, a.num, a.item_num, a.sh_amount, a.sh_time, a.sh_note, b.name, c.item_name, c.item_price from shipment a join store b on a.num = b.num join item c on a.item_num = c.item_num where od_num = #{od_num}

select s.name, sum((r.sales*p.prod_price)) "maechul" from result r left join product p on r.prod_num = p.prod_num left join store s on r.num = s.num where r.rs_date = '2024-03-20' group by s.name order by 2 desc limit 5
